actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The priest makes two attacks, using Mace or Radiant Flame in any combination.

actions.name: Mace
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Flame
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 60 ft. Hit: 11 (2d10) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.description:
The priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At Will: Light, Thaumaturgy
1/Day: Spirit Guardians

bonus_actions.name: Divine Aid
bonus_actions.description: The priest casts Bless, Dispel Magic, Healing Word, or Lesser Restoration, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
